projectUsers.title: Project Users
projectUsers.description: Manage users and permissions for the current project.

projectRoles.title: Project Roles
projectRoles.description: Manage roles and permissions for the current project.

users.title: User Management
users.description: Manage system users and permission configurations.

add.title: Add New User
add.description: Create new user here. Click save when you're done.

addToProject.title: Add User to Project
addToProject.description: Add a user to a project with specific roles and permissions.

edit.title: Edit User
edit.description: Update the user here. Click save when you're done.

statusChange.title: {{action}} User
statusChange.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to {{action}} user {{name}}?
statusChange.deactivateWarning: After deactivation, this user will not be able to log in to the system.
statusChange.activateInfo: After activation, this user will be able to log in to the system normally.

activate.title: Activate User
activate.description: Are you sure you want to activate user {{name}}?
activate.note: After activation, this user will be able to log in to the system normally.

deactivate.title: Deactivate User
deactivate.description: Are you sure you want to deactivate user {{name}}?
deactivate.note: After deactivation, this user will not be able to log in to the system.

remove.title: Remove User from Project
remove.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from this project?
remove.confirmLabel: Type the user's full name to confirm:
remove.warningDescription: This action will remove the user from the project. They will lose access to all project resources.

form.ownerDescription: Grant owner privileges to this user
form.selectUserPlaceholder: Select a user to add to project

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.newPasswordMinLength: New password must be at least 8 characters

messages.loadRolesError: Failed to load roles and scopes
messages.addToProjectError: Failed to add user to project
messages.removeFromProjectError: Failed to remove user from project

errors.insufficientPermissions: You don't have sufficient permissions to edit this user

apikeys.title: API Key Management
apikeys.description: Manage system API keys and access permissions.

create.title: Create API Key
create.description: Create a new API Key for system access.

delete.title: Delete API Key
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete API Key {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.

status.title: Change Status
status.description: Are you sure you want to change the status of this API Key?
status.enableDescription: Are you sure you want to enable API Key {{name}}?
status.disableDescription: Are you sure you want to disable API Key {{name}}?

archive.title: Archive API Key
archive.description: Are you sure you want to archive API Key {{name}}?
archive.warning: This action will hide the API Key from the list. You can still view archived keys by using the status filter.

view.title: View API Key
view.description: View the complete API key details.
view.warning: ⚠️ Keep your API key secure and do not share it with unauthorized parties. Anyone with access to this key can make requests on your behalf.

bulkDisable.title: Bulk Disable API Keys
bulkDisable.description: Are you sure you want to disable {{count}} selected API keys? This action cannot be undone.

bulkArchive.title: Bulk Archive API Keys
bulkArchive.description: Are you sure you want to archive {{count}} selected API keys? This action cannot be undone.

name.label: Name
name.description: Set an easily recognizable name for this API Key

userID.label: User ID
userID.description: The user ID associated with this API Key

errors.fetchData: Failed to fetch API key data
errors.fetchDetails: Failed to fetch API key details

validation.atLeastOneProfile: At least one profile is required
validation.activeProfileMustExist: Active profile must exist in the profile list

profiles.title: API Key Profiles
profiles.description: Configure model mapping profiles for {{name}}. When an active profile has model mappings configured, the system will automatically map requested models to their target models during API requests.

roles.title: Role Management
roles.description: Manage system roles and permission configurations.

create.title: Create Role
create.description: Create a new role and configure its permission scopes.

edit.title: Edit Role
edit.description: Modify role information and permission configuration.

delete.title: Delete Role
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this role? This action cannot be undone.

bulkDelete.title: Bulk Delete Roles
bulkDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected roles? This action cannot be undone.

scopes.label: Permission Scopes
scopes.description: Select the permissions this role has

validation.scopesRequired: At least one permission is required

edit.title: Edit Project
edit.slugNotEditable: Project slug cannot be modified after creation

archive.title: Archive Project
archive.description: Are you sure you want to archive project "{{name}}"? Archived projects will no longer appear in the active list.

activate.title: Activate Project
activate.description: Are you sure you want to activate project "{{name}}"? Activated projects will appear in the active list again.

slug.label: Project Slug
slug.description: URL-friendly unique identifier (leave empty to auto-generate)

channels.title: Channel Management
channels.description: Manage your AI model channels and configurations.

errorBanner.message: {{count}} channel(s) need attention for disabled due to unrecoverable errors

messages.addAtLeastOneModel: Please add at least one supported model
messages.pendingMappingWarning: There are pending model mappings, please add them before saving.
messages.duplicateMappingWarning: Duplicate model mapping detected. Please remove the duplicate mapping before saving.
messages.fetchModelsSuccessLarge: Successfully fetched {{count}} models. Use search to find specific models.
messages.Unauthorized: Unauthorized, please check the API key of the channel
messages.Not Found: Endpoint not found, pleast check the base url of the channel
messages.Interval Server Error: Interval server error, please confirm the channel configuration

errors.fetchNames: Failed to load existing channel names
errors.fetchOrdering: Failed to load channels for ordering

create.title: Add Channel
create.description: Create a new AI model channel.

bulkImport.title: Bulk Import Channels
bulkImport.description: Import multiple channels from CSV data. One channel per line, comma-separated fields.
bulkImport.requiredFieldsNote: Note: baseURL and apiKey are required fields
bulkImport.supportedTypes: Supported types: openai, anthropic, anthropic_aws, anthropic_gcp, gemini_openai, deepseek, doubao, moonshot, zhipu, zai, deepseek_anthropic, moonshot_anthropic, zhipu_anthropic, zai_anthropic, openrouter, xai
bulkImport.inputPlaceholder: Enter channel data to import, one per line...
bulkImport.baseUrlRequired: Line {{line}}: Base URL cannot be empty
bulkImport.apiKeyRequired: Line {{line}}: API Key cannot be empty
bulkImport.duplicateName: Line {{line}}: Channel name "{{name}}" is duplicate. Each channel must have a unique name
bulkImport.duplicateNameWithExisting: Line {{line}}: Channel name "{{name}}" already exists on server. Each channel must have a unique name

name.label: Channel Name
name.description: Set an easily recognizable name for this channel

type.label: Channel Type
type.description: Select the AI model provider type
type.helper: Channel types are OpenAI-compatible by default; types containing "Anthropic" follow the Anthropic-compatible format.

baseURL.label: Base URL
baseURL.description: The base URL address for the API

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.multiLineHint: One API key per line, will create multiple channels if provided multiple keys.

supportedModels.label: Models
supportedModels.description: List of models supported by this channel
supportedModels.required: Please add at least one supported model
supportedModels.largeListHint: Fetched {{count}} models. Use the search above to find specific models.

awsAccessKeyID.label: AWS Access Key ID
awsAccessKeyID.description: AWS access key ID for authentication

awsSecretAccessKey.label: AWS Secret Access Key
awsSecretAccessKey.description: AWS secret access key for authentication

gcpJsonData.label: Service Account JSON
gcpJsonData.placeholder: Paste your GCP service account JSON credentials here
gcpJsonData.description: Complete JSON credentials for GCP service account authentication

jsonData.label: GCP Service Account JSON
jsonData.placeholder: Paste your GCP service account JSON credentials here
jsonData.description: Complete JSON credentials for GCP service account authentication

enable.title: Enable Channel
enable.description: Are you sure you want to enable channel "{{name}}"? The channel will be available for use after enabling.
enable.warning: Please ensure the channel configuration is correct and test the connection before enabling to avoid service interruptions.

disable.title: Disable Channel
disable.description: Are you sure you want to disable channel "{{name}}"? The channel will be unavailable after disabling.

archive.title: Archive Channel
archive.description: Are you sure you want to archive channel "{{name}}"? Archived channels are hidden by default and will not appear in the channel list unless the archived filter is explicitly selected.
archive.warning: This channel will be hidden from the default view. You can view archived channels by selecting the 'Archived' status filter.

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.description: Basic configuration information for the Channel

extraModelPrefix.title: Extra Model Prefix
extraModelPrefix.description: Configure an extra model prefix to allow accessing this channel with prefixed model names. For example: with prefix 'deepseek', both 'deepseek/deepseek-chat' and 'deepseek-chat' can access this channel

modelMapping.title: Model Alias
modelMapping.description: Use aliases to expose channel-supported models under alternative names without transforming the request model. For example: register 'gpt-4' as an alias of 'gpt-4-turbo', and both names will be handled by this channel

parameters.title: Override Body
parameters.description: Provide JSON-formatted overrides to customize the request body sent through this channel. Use "__AXONHUB_CLEAR__" as the value to remove a parameter from the request body.

headers.title: Override Headers
headers.description: Configure custom HTTP headers that will be applied to all requests sent through this channel.

proxy.title: Proxy Configuration

config.title: Proxy Settings
config.description: Configure how this channel connects through a proxy server

proxy.environmentHint: The channel will use proxy settings from environment variables (HTTP_PROXY, HTTPS_PROXY, NO_PROXY)
proxy.disabledHint: The channel will connect directly without using any proxy

bulkOrdering.title: Bulk Channel Ordering
bulkOrdering.description: Drag and drop to reorder channels. Higher priority channels will be displayed first.

bulkArchive.title: Bulk Archive Channels
bulkArchive.description: Are you sure you want to archive {{count}} selected channels? Archived channels are hidden from the default list.
bulkArchive.warning: This action will hide all selected channels from regular views. You can still find them by filtering by archived status.

bulkDisable.title: Bulk Disable Channels
bulkDisable.description: Are you sure you want to disable {{count}} selected channels? Disabled channels won't process requests until re-enabled.
bulkDisable.warning: This action will make all selected channels unavailable. Enable them again from the channel list when needed.

bulkEnable.title: Bulk Enable Channels
bulkEnable.description: Are you sure you want to enable {{count}} selected channels? Enabled channels will be available to process requests.
bulkEnable.warning: This action will make all selected channels available for use. Make sure the channels are properly configured.

bulkDelete.title: Bulk Delete Channels
bulkDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected channels?
bulkDelete.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone
bulkDelete.warningDetail: This will permanently delete all selected channels and their related data. This cannot be recovered.

errorResolved.title: Resolve Channel Error
errorResolved.description: Are you sure you want to resolve the error for channel "{{channelName}}"? This will clear the error message: "{{errorMessage}}"

validation.supportedModelsRequired: At least one supported model is required
validation.defaultTestModelRequired: Please select a default test model
validation.awsAccessKeyIdRequired: AWS Access Key ID is required
validation.awsSecretAccessKeyRequired: AWS Secret Access Key is required
validation.gcpJsonDataRequired: GCP Service Account JSON is required
validation.atLeastOneChannel: At least one channel is required
validation.forbiddenHeader: Header cannot override sensitive headers like Authorization, API-Key, or Cookie

dataStorages.description: Manage your data storage configurations and settings.

create.description: Configure a new data storage location.

delete.title: Delete Data Storage
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete data storage {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.

status.title: Change Status
status.description: Are you sure you want to change the status of this data storage?
status.activateDescription: Are you sure you want to activate data storage {{name}}?
status.archiveDescription: Are you sure you want to archive data storage {{name}}?

name.label: Name
name.description: Set an easily recognizable name for this storage

directory.label: Directory Path
directory.description: Directory path for file system storage

s3AccessKey.label: Access Key
s3AccessKey.editPlaceholder: Leave empty to keep current value

s3SecretKey.label: Secret Key
s3SecretKey.editPlaceholder: Leave empty to keep current value

gcsCredential.label: Service Account JSON
gcsCredential.editPlaceholder: Leave empty to keep current value

validation.gcsCredentialRequired: GCS service account JSON is required
validation.gcsCredentialInvalid: GCS credential must be a valid JSON object

dataStorages.llmStorageHint: Can be used to configure storage for LLM request and response bodies

dataStorage.title: Default Data Storage
dataStorage.description: Select the default storage location for storing request and response data
dataStorage.label: Data Storage

storage.title: Storage Settings
storage.description: Configure how the system handles and stores response data

storeChunks.label: Store Response Chunks
storeChunks.description: When enabled, the system will store response data chunks in the database for subsequent analysis and processing

policy.title: Storage Policy
policy.description: Configure storage policies and data cleanup settings

storeChunks.label: Store Response Chunks
storeChunks.description: When enabled, the system will store response data chunks in the database for subsequent analysis and processing

storeRequestBody.label: Store Request Body
storeRequestBody.description: If disabled, original request body will not be persisted.

storeResponseBody.label: Store Response Body
storeResponseBody.description: If disabled, final response body will not be persisted.

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Configure basic system information and branding settings

brandName.label: Brand Name
brandName.description: Set the system brand name that will be displayed in the interface

brandLogo.label: Brand Logo
brandLogo.description: Upload a square PNG or JPEG logo (max 2MB). The logo will be displayed in the system interface.
brandLogo.invalidFormat: Please upload a PNG or JPEG image file.
brandLogo.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 2MB.
brandLogo.notSquare: Please upload a square image (width equals height).

other.title: Other Settings
other.description: More system configuration options will be added here

retry.title: Retry Policy
retry.description: Configure automatic retry behavior for failed requests

enabled.label: Enable Retry
enabled.description: When enabled, the system will automatically retry failed requests

maxChannelRetries.label: Max Channel Retries
maxChannelRetries.description: Maximum number of times to retry across different channels (0-10)

maxSingleChannelRetries.label: Max Single Channel Retries
maxSingleChannelRetries.description: Maximum number of times to retry on the same channel (0-5)

retryDelayMs.label: Retry Delay
retryDelayMs.description: Delay between retry attempts in milliseconds (100-10000ms)

requests.title: Request Logs
requests.description: View and manage LLM call request logs

threads.title: Thread Management
threads.description: View and manage AI conversation threads and related traces

detail.title: Thread Details
detail.tracesSubtitle: Review recent traces and executions for this thread

traces.title: Trace Management
traces.description: View and manage AI request traces and execution flows

detail.title: Trace Details
detail.noSpanContent: No additional content for this span.
detail.selectSpanHint: Select a span from the timeline to inspect its detail.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.emptyDescription: Timeline data is unavailable for this trace.

usageLogs.title: Usage Logs
usageLogs.description: View and analyze AI model usage and token consumption

charts.requestsByChannelDescription: Distribution of requests across different channels.
charts.requestsByModelDescription: Distribution of requests across different AI models.

stats.usersWithMostRequests: Users with the most requests this month.
stats.projectsWithMostRequests: Projects with the most requests this month.

playground.title: Playground
playground.description: Test and experiment with AI models in an interactive environment.

chat.typeMessageBelow: Type your message below to begin

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and set e-mail preferences.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.

firstName.label: First Name
firstName.description: Your first name as it will appear to other users.
firstName.maxLength: First name must not be longer than 50 characters.

lastName.label: Last Name
lastName.description: Your last name as it will appear to other users.
lastName.maxLength: Last name must not be longer than 50 characters.

email.label: Email
email.description: Your email address for account notifications and login.
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address.

preferLanguage.label: Preferred Language
preferLanguage.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface.

avatar.label: Avatar
avatar.description: Upload a profile picture. Recommended size is 200x200 pixels.

validation.firstNameTooLong: First name must not be longer than 50 characters.
validation.lastNameTooLong: Last name must not be longer than 50 characters.
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.

routeGuard.noPermission: You do not have permission to access this page. Please contact the administrator to obtain the necessary access permissions.

projectGuard.pleaseSelectProject: Please select a project from the project switcher to continue.
projectGuard.pleaseJoinOrCreateProject: You haven't joined any projects yet. Please create a new project or ask an administrator to add you to an existing project.

errors.sessionExpiredSignIn: Session expired. Please sign in again.

initialization.title: Initialize System
initialization.description: Welcome to AxonHub! Please set up the system by creating an owner account.

validation.ownerPasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

brand.title: Unified AI Gateway
brand.description: Unified OpenAI/Anthropic compatible API with a flexible transformer pipeline, intelligent routing, and comprehensive tracing—built for enterprise reliability.

signIn.title: Sign in to AxonHub
signIn.subtitle: Enter your email and password to access your account

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordPattern: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one digit

footer.agreement: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
